node.title: Government will not make complaint about Chinese navy ship near Australian waters
node.alt: A navy surveilance ship with a Chines flag on it in the ocean
node.description: The Prime Minister says the government had been aware of a Chinese navy ship that wasÂ in waters off the Australian coast recently, adding it did not break international law.
node.content: ["The Prime Minister says the government had been aware of a Chinese navy ship that was\u00a0in waters off the Australian coast recently, adding it did not break international law.", "Speaking on Adelaide radio station 5AA, Scott Morrison said the ship was in Australia's economic zone.", "\"They can be in those areas just like we can be in the South China Sea,\" he said.", "Home Affairs Minister Karen Andrews confirmed the government monitored\u00a0the ship as it travelled through the Torres Strait and down the eastern coastline.", "\"In this case, that particular vessel was in our exclusive economic zone, not in territorial waters as such, but we actually do respect the right of sovereign nations to behave in a manner that is lawful,\" she said.", "No formal complaint or protest will be made about the ship.", "In a statement, a Department of Defence spokesperson said Defence was aware the People's Liberation Army intelligence ship Yuhengxing operated off the east coast in August this year.", "Mr Morrison said the ship's presence showed the nature of the geo-political tensions in the Indo-Pacific region.", "\"People are not making this up,\" he said.", "\"It does mean that Australia has to be on its guard and Australia has to stand up to those who want to coerce us \u2026 and slap trade sanctions on things like our wine, and our government is standing up to that.\"", "That was echoed by Defence Minister Peter Dutton on Channel Nine, who pointed to the fact that another Chinese surveillance ship travelled near Queensland in July to monitor Australian and US military exercises.\u00a0", "\"[The ship] will be involved in intelligence collection, signals collection,\" he said.", "\"They'll be looking to survey different attributes and have that general presence \u2014\u00a0let us know that they're there.", "\"I think it's right people have a clear picture of what's going on.\""]
